groupList.Notes: ID of AF Element mapping to the Visual KPI Group
A setting of false (default) will only list child groups while a setting of true will list all descendant groups
A semicolon (;) delimited list of status ordinals to filter out.  E.g. “3:0:-102” will filter out HHH, Good and Not In Service

groupGeo.Notes: ID of AF Element mapping to the Visual KPI Group
A setting of false (default) will only list child groups while a setting of true will list all descendant groups
A semicolon (;) delimited list of status ordinals to filter out.  E.g. “3:0:-102” will filter out HHH, Good and Not In Service

groupBlock.Notes: ID of AF Element mapping to the Visual KPI Group
A semicolon (;) delimited list of status ordinals to filter out.  E.g. “3:0:-102” will filter out HHH, Good and Not In Service

kpiList.Notes: ID of AF Element mapping to the Visual KPI Group
A setting of false (default) will only list child KPIs of the Group while a setting of true will list all descendant KPIs
A semicolon (;) delimited list of status ordinals to filter out.  E.g. “3:0:-102” will filter out HHH, Good and Not In Service
This can be used to override the default grouping.  Standard Attributes (None, Status, Group) and Custom Attributes (e.g., Unit, Region, etc.) can be used.
Overrides the default Start Time for Sparklines.  This must be paired with an End Time).  Can be relative (*-8h) or a fixed timestamp
Overrides the default End Time for Sparklines.  This must be paired with a Start Time).  Can be relative (*) or a fixed timestamp

genericLink.Notes: URL of the link.  This is meant for external links.  For internal Visual KPI links use the System Link bookmark.

dashboard.Notes: ID of AF Attribute mapping to the Visual KPI Dashboard

systemLink.Notes: Partial system link (query string).  This partial url is everything but the base URL and be be found by browsing the Visual KPI site and copying the query string. (e.g., ?pid=10&gid=43cf45a9-61a7-11ec-897e-ccd0c6467bcf&gid0=62d7a593-61a6-11ec-897e-ccd0c6467bcf)
